job_description: Co-op Student Position: May- August 2015 (Summer Term)Lab Technician Coop                       No. of position - 1This position is limited to students that are registered in a recognized Co-Op or Intern Program at a Canadian College or University.As part of a lab team the person will responsible for the carrying out the following activities:• General Lab Support (e.g. : Searching for cards, test equipment set ups, cables, etc …. to support designers to do their jobs)• Moves, Adds and Changes (e.g.: Setting up PC's, workstations or new equipment that is moving from one area to another)• Debug Cards, repair cards or send cards out for repair• Equipment support, repair and set up for EUTs and non ALU gear• Maintain an inventory of in use products• Comply to the TL9000 (e.g. test equipment calibration support)
job_requirements: Alcatel-Lucent Canada is committed to building a skilled, diverse workforce reflective of Canadian society. As a result, we promote employment equity and encourage women, Aboriginal persons, persons with a disability or members of a visible minority group to applyOpen To All Majors:No
